Build ID: I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Hit Refactor->Rename
2. Nothing happens (except stack trace)

If I exit eclipse, and restart, all is fine again.

If I interpret the stacktrace correctly, this NPE only occurs on shutdown. I've added protection for this case.

However, you should never have gotten into that state in the first place. Could you please check the log for other exceptions that happened just before you got into the unresponsive state?

For I20070410-0800, I've already released a fix that should reset the rename environment in case an error occurred in a previous invocation.

To be honest, I did not know about eclipse's .log
There are so many exceptions, it is hard to tie
it in with this exception.
I will check it periodically from now on.

> I will check it periodically from now on.

Thanks. The interesting exceptions would contain RenameInformationPopup or RenameLinkedMode.
Verified through code review in I20070502-0010.
